Attachment.description: Definition of a Web RCA attachment.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Attachment' if this is a complete object or 'AttachmentLink' if it is just a link.

Error.description: Definition of a Web RCA error.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Error' if this is a complete object or 'ErrorLink' if it is just a link.

Escalation.description: Definition of a Web RCA escalation.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Escalation' if this is a complete object or 'EscalationLink' if it is just a link.

Event.description: Definition of a Web RCA event.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Event' if this is a complete object or 'EventLink' if it is just a link.

FollowUp.description: Definition of a Web RCA event.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'FollowUp' if this is a complete object or 'FollowUpLink' if it is just a link.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'FollowUpChange' if this is a complete object or 'FollowUpChangeLink' if it is just a link.

Handoff.description: Definition of a Web RCA handoff.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Handoff' if this is a complete object or 'HandoffLink' if it is just a link.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Incident' if this is a complete object or 'IncidentLink' if it is just a link.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Notification' if this is a complete object or 'NotificationLink' if it is just a link.

Product.description: Definition of a Web RCA product.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Product' if this is a complete object or 'ProductLink' if it is just a link.

product_id.description: The product ID from status board

product_name.description: The name of the product from status-board.

StatusChange.description: Definition of a Web RCA event.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'StatusChange' if this is a complete object or 'StatusChangeLink' if it is just a link.

User.description: Definition of a Web RCA user.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'User' if this is a complete object or 'UserLink' if it is just a link.
Indicates the type of this object. Will always be 'Error'

code.description: Globally unique code of the error, composed of the unique identifier of the API and the numeric identifier of the error. For example, for if the numeric identifier of the error is `93` and the identifier of the API is `clusters_mgmt` then the code will be `CLUSTERS-MGMT-93`.

reason.description: Human readable description of the error.
